verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁמִינִ֔י <S%H8066><s%> hash-she-mi-Ni, And it came to pass on the eighth קָרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra called מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, [that] Moses לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> le-'a-ha-Ron Aaron וּלְבָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> u-le-va-Nav; and his sons וּלְזִקְנֵ֖י <S%H2205><s%> u-le-zik-Nei and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, unto Aaron קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> kach- Take לְ֠ךָ Le-cha עֵ֣גֶל <S%H5695><s%> 'E-gel calf בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- afflicted בָּקָ֧ר <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar bull לְחַטָּ֛את <S%H2403><s%> le-chat-Tat for a sin offering וְאַ֥יִל <S%H352><s%> ve-'A-yil and a ram לְעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> le-'o-Lah for a burnt offering תְּמִימִ֑ם <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mim; without blemish וְהַקְרֵ֖ב <S%H7126><s%> ve-hak-Rev and offer לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei [them] before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- then בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel תְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> te-dab-Ber thou shalt speak לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying קְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> ke-Chu Take שְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> se-'ir- ye a kid עִזִּים֙ <S%H5795><s%> 'iz-Zim of the goats לְחַטָּ֔את <S%H2403><s%> le-chat-Tat, for a sin offering וְעֵ֨גֶל <S%H5695><s%> ve-'E-gel and a calf וָכֶ֧בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> va-Che-ves and a lamb בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- [both] of the first שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year תְּמִימִ֖ם <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mim without blemish לְעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> le-'o-Lah. for a burnt offering

וְשׁ֨וֹר <S%H7794><s%> ve-Shor Also a bullock וָאַ֜יִל <S%H352><s%> va-'A-yil and a ram לִשְׁלָמִ֗ים <S%H8002><s%> lish-la-Mim, for peace offerings לִזְבֹּ֙חַ֙ <S%H2076><s%> liz-Bo-ach to sacrifice לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD וּמִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> u-min-Chah and a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> vash-Sha-men; with oil כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, for to day יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD נִרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> nir-'Ah will appear אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem. about

וַיִּקְח֗וּ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu, And they brought אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, [that] which Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei before אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וַֽיִּקְרְבוּ֙ <S%H7126><s%> vai-yik-re-Vu drew near כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and the whole הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah, and all the congregation וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'am-Du and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses זֶ֧ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su; that ye should do וְיֵרָ֥א <S%H7200><s%> ve-ye-Ra shall appear אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem about כְּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ke-Vod and the glory יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, unto Aaron קְרַ֤ב <S%H7126><s%> ke-Rav Go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach unto the altar וַעֲשֵׂ֞ה <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-Seh and offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חַטָּֽאתְךָ֙ <S%H2403><s%> chat-ta-te-Cha thy sin offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עֹ֣לָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H5930><s%> 'o-la-Te-cha, and thy burnt offering וְכַפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> ve-chap-Per and make an atonement בַּֽעַדְךָ֖ <S%H1157><s%> ba-'ad-Cha about וּבְעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> u-ve-'Ad and for הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; for thyself and for the people וַעֲשֵׂ֞ה <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-Seh and offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קָרְבַּ֤ן <S%H7133><s%> ka-re-Ban the offering הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of the people וְכַפֵּ֣ר <S%H3722><s%> ve-chap-Per and make an atonement בַּֽעֲדָ֔ם <S%H1157><s%> ba-'a-Dam, about כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. for them as the LORD

וַיִּקְרַ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> vai-yik-Rav therefore went אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach; unto the altar וַיִּשְׁחַ֛ט <S%H7819><s%> vai-yish-Chat and slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵ֥גֶל <S%H5695><s%> 'E-gel the calf הַחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> ha-chat-Tat of the sin offering אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וַ֠יַּקְרִבוּ <S%H7126><s%> Vai-yak-ri-vu brought בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the sons אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּם֮ <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam the blood אֵלָיו֒ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him וַיִּטְבֹּ֤ל <S%H2881><s%> vai-yit-Bol unto him and he dipped אֶצְבָּעוֹ֙ <S%H676><s%> etz-ba-'O his finger בַּדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> bad-Dam, in the blood וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on קַרְנ֣וֹת <S%H7161><s%> kar-Not [it] upon the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach; of the altar וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַדָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam out the blood יָצַ֔ק <S%H3332><s%> ya-Tzak, and poured אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at יְס֖וֹד <S%H3247><s%> ye-Sod at the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach. of the altar

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַחֵ֨לֶב <S%H2459><s%> ha-Che-lev But the fat וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַכְּלָיֹ֜ת <S%H3629><s%> hak-ke-la-Yot and the kidneys וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיֹּתֶ֤רֶת <S%H3508><s%> hai-yo-Te-ret and the caul מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- above הַכָּבֵד֙ <S%H3516><s%> hak-ka-Ved the liver מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַ֣חַטָּ֔את <S%H2403><s%> ha-chat-Tat, of the sin offering הִקְטִ֖יר <S%H6999><s%> hik-Tir he burnt הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-chah; upon the altar כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. Moses

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַבָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> hab-ba-Sar And the flesh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָע֑וֹר <S%H5785><s%> ha-'Or; and the hide שָׂרַ֣ף <S%H8313><s%> sa-Raf he burnt בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh, with fire מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz without לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> Lam-ma-cha-Neh. the camp

וַיִּשְׁחַ֖ט <S%H7819><s%> vai-yish-Chat And he slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah; the burnt offering וַ֠יַּמְצִאוּ <S%H4672><s%> Vai-yam-tzi-'u presented בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei sons אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron's אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam, unto him the blood וַיִּזְרְקֵ֥הוּ <S%H2236><s%> vai-yiz-re-Ke-hu which he sprinkled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. round about

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָעֹלָ֗ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah, the burnt offering הִמְצִ֧יאוּ <S%H4672><s%> him-Tzi-'u And they presented אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him לִנְתָחֶ֖יהָ <S%H5409><s%> lin-ta-Chei-ha unto him with the pieces וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָרֹ֑אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh; thereof and the head וַיַּקְטֵ֖ר <S%H6999><s%> vai-yak-Ter and he burnt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach. [them] upon the altar

וַיִּרְחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> vai-yir-Chatz And he did wash אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַקֶּ֖רֶב <S%H7130><s%> hak-Ke-rev the inwards וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַכְּרָעָ֑יִם <S%H3767><s%> hak-ke-ra-'A-yim; and the legs וַיַּקְטֵ֥ר <S%H6999><s%> vai-yak-Ter and burnt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- with הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah [them] upon the burnt offering הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-chah. on the altar

וַיַּקְרֵ֕ב <S%H7126><s%> vai-yak-Rev And he brought אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et קָרְבַּ֣ן <S%H7133><s%> ka-re-Ban offering הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; the people's וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׂעִ֤יר <S%H8163><s%> se-'Ir the goat הַֽחַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> ha-chat-taT which [was] the sin offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> la-'Am, for the people וַיִּשְׁחָטֵ֥הוּ <S%H7819><s%> vai-yish-cha-Te-hu and slew וַֽיְחַטְּאֵ֖הוּ <S%H2398><s%> vay-chat-te-'E-hu it and offered it for sin כָּרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H7223><s%> ka-ri-Shon. as the first

וַיַּקְרֵ֖ב <S%H7126><s%> vai-yak-Rev And he brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah; the burnt offering וַֽיַּעֲשֶׂ֖הָ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Se-ha and offered כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> kam-mish-Pat. it according to the manner

וַיַּקְרֵב֮ <S%H7126><s%> vai-yak-Rev And he brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּנְחָה֒ <S%H4503><s%> ham-min-Chah the meat offering וַיְמַלֵּ֤א <S%H4390><s%> vay-mal-Le and took כַפּוֹ֙ <S%H3709><s%> chap-Po an handful מִמֶּ֔נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah, some וַיַּקְטֵ֖ר <S%H6999><s%> vai-yak-Ter thereof and burnt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach; [it] upon the altar מִלְּבַ֖ד <S%H905><s%> mil-le-Vad beside עֹלַ֥ת <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lat the burnt sacrifice הַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> hab-Bo-ker. of the morning

וַיִּשְׁחַ֤ט <S%H7819><s%> vai-yish-Chat He slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשּׁוֹר֙ <S%H7794><s%> hash-shOr also the bullock וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> ha-'A-yil, and the ram זֶ֥בַח <S%H2077><s%> Ze-vach [for] a sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> hash-she-la-Mim of peace offerings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> la-'Am; which [was] for the people וַ֠יַּמְצִאוּ <S%H4672><s%> Vai-yam-tzi-'u presented בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei sons אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron's אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּם֙ <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam unto him the blood אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him וַיִּזְרְקֵ֥הוּ <S%H2236><s%> vai-yiz-re-Ke-hu which he sprinkled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. round about

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַחֲלָבִ֖ים <S%H2459><s%> ha-cha-la-Vim And the fat מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַשּׁ֑וֹר <S%H7794><s%> hash-Shor; of the bullock וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- and from הָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> ha-'A-yil, and of the ram הָֽאַלְיָ֤ה <S%H451><s%> ha-'al-Yah the rump וְהַֽמְכַסֶּה֙ <S%H4374><s%> ve-ham-chas-Seh and that which covereth וְהַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <S%H3629><s%> ve-hak-ke-la-Yot, [the inwards] and the kidneys וְיֹתֶ֖רֶת <S%H3508><s%> ve-yo-Te-ret and the caul הַכָּבֵֽד׃ <S%H3516><s%> hak-ka-Ved. [above] the liver
